alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 10:20AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wakulla County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1020 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Tully and Wakulla Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
